entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 04:27 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
